name: Programmable Cell Death
description:
Viruses have invaded your body. Time to do the only thing that makes sense: grab your laser gun and go hunting.

PCD is a stylized rail shooter where you fly through the human body tagging red blood cells, fighting off white blood cells, busting clots, avoiding organs, and blasting the invading viruses.

PCD was build in three days for the Unreal Engine 4 November 2015 game jam. https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?90285-November-UE4JAM-November-12-15th-THEME-DESPERATE-DISEASES-REQUIRE-DANGEROUS-REMEDIES

EPILEPSY WARNING: Game contains bright lights and repeating flashing patterns. Please enjoy with caution.
